entry.title: some jQuery effects
entry.content:
I need to reference some simple JavaScript over here for a site I'm building. We're going to review the basic jQuery effects and end up explaining method syntax.

{% codeblock Hide Method - hide.js %} hide() {% endcodeblock %} This method hides all the elements in a jQuery object.
{% codeblock Timed Hide - hide.js %} hide(time)
hide(time, easing) {% endcodeblock %} Passing in the time constraint hides elements in a jQuery object over the duration with an optional easing style.
{% codeblock hide with function - hide.js %} hide(time, function)
hide(time, easing, function) {% endcodeblock %} Hide the elements in a jQuery object over the specified duration with an optional easing style and a function called when the effect is complete.
{% codeblock Show Method - show.js %} show() {% endcodeblock %} This method shows all the elements in a jQuery object.
{% codeblock Timed show - show.js %} show(time)
show(time, easing) {% endcodeblock %} Passing in the time constraint shows elements in a jQuery object over the duration with an optional easing style.
{% codeblock show with function - show.js %} show(time, function)
show(time, easing, function) {% endcodeblock %} Show the elements in a jQuery object over the specified duration with an optional easing style and a function called when the effect is complete.
